Posts.Content: Hi y onne17. I'm new to this site and already I feel I'm not alone. It is so positive to read the messages, especially when people are saying I have to have a nap and I feel frustrated. I thought that was just me ! I was asking myself when I would be me again and I can accept I will still be me but just not as energetic. X hope you have a good day
Posts.Title: When will I be "ME" again ???

Posts.Content: I posted last week that I had developed an awful cough. I went to my gp on Tuesday, had a chest X-ray on Wednesday and the docs phoned me Friday to say I have infection in my lower mid and upper lobes of my right lung. I am taking antibiotics and have to see doc again tUes. I don't feel too good although my cough is better. I am scared that. It isn't infection but secondary cancer. My daughter and my partner say I would have been told straight away if it was anything worse, but it am scared ....
Posts.Title: Chest infection

Posts.Content: Hi mistymoley. Thank you ...... That's what my family say so I need to get more positive xx hugs xxxx
Posts.Title: Chest infection

Posts.Content: Hi my lovely friends. I have developed a crackling in my chest and an awful cough I cannot seem to shake off. I was diagnosed with BC December had 20 radiotherapy session which finished early march. I am taking letrozole. I get out of breath really easily and as I say have developed this cough. What do you think?.. Alison xxx
Posts.Title: Coughing
